Thorin Battlehammer.name: Thorin Battlehammer
Thorin Battlehammer.appearance: Short, square framed blonde long bearded dwarf with chainmail big feet and blue eyes.
Thorin Battlehammer.personality: Absentminded, aloof, down to do his own thing. Doesn't care about danger, sunbathes instead. Doesn't trust easily, dislikes work.
Thorin Battlehammer.backstory: A traveling cleric whose finds adventure when adventure finds him regardless of if he is looking.
Thorin Battlehammer.notes: Prefers naps in the sun; often ignores NPCs in favor of relaxation.

Nova Haldark.name: Nova Haldark
Nova Haldark.appearance: Short, thin black haired Aasimar with tanned skin, freckles and eyes that look like a flickering campfire.
Nova Haldark.personality: Warm, curious, overly trusting and adventerous.
Nova Haldark.backstory: She had a mundane childhood and her parents are the extremely supportive of her adventerous career.
Nova Haldark.notes: Pefers peaceful solutions, and overly trusting.

Nine Ells.name: Nine Ells
Nine Ells.appearance: Short, slim, shoulder length blonde hair. Knee length black dress and tights.
Nine Ells.personality: A little crazy and tries to charm OR threaten people into doing what she wants.
Nine Ells.backstory: A traveling wizard whose aspirations lend towards death, necromancy and darkness. Enjoys sightseeing graveyards wherever she goes.
Nine Ells.notes: Prefers to instigate NPCs with words and spells.

Fenwick.name: Fenwick
Fenwick.appearance: Towering, gold and black scales, long black horns, purple claws, blue eyes with a small scar on the cheek.
Fenwick.personality: Quick witted, quick to anger, gaslighting, mistrusting thief.
Fenwick.backstory: A traveling rogue whose aspirations lend towards thievery and greed.
Fenwick.notes: Prefers lurking in the back and not putting themselves into immediate danger; often tries to steal from NPCs.

Rilven Anatar.name: Rivlen Anatar
Rilven Anatar.appearance: Tall, short black hair, grey eyes. Grey clothing and matt black boots.
Rilven Anatar.personality: Slow to trust, but desires trust from others. Dislikes magic and those who use it too freely. Takes things too literally, and over analizes.
Rilven Anatar.backstory: Grew up in a small northern village. He haas had little contact with other elves. He has estranged himself from many of the rangers though he still maintains strong connections.
